Name: Accepted
Description: This feature can be and will be implemented

Name: Blocked
Description: Another issue preventing this from being fixed/implemented. Resolution of the main issue required

Name: Delayed
Description: This issue will be dealt with at a later time (major update/more free time)

Name: External bug
Description: An issue caused by other software or hardware malfunctioning

Name: Help wanted
Description: An external help would be welcome to resolve this issue

Name: Impossible
Description: This feature is deemed to be impossible to implement with current tools and research available

Name: Investigation
Description: This feature is undergoing investigation whether it's possible and feasible to implement

Name: Out of scope
Description: This suggestion is out of scope of this project
